      • format

        static java.lang.String format​(java.time.Duration duration,
                               java.lang.String format)
        Formats the Duration to the given format. Formats support are any supported by DurationFormatUtils.formatDuration
        Parameters:
        duration -
        format - to render duration to.
        Returns:
        a blank string if duration is null otherwise the duration as per the format.
